Articles.Content:
Its that time of year once again when all the plants die and temperatures plummet! Seeing how it worked last time, lets see if this can become a tradition.    The kerbals are taking a break from launching in uncontrollable shuttles, burning up in the atmosphere, being sent into the depths of Jool, and being crammed into an extremely undersized spacecraft for years at a time, to celebrate Kristmas when Kanta Klause comes and brings presents for any kerbal willing to co-operate with the KSP! Goes like this:

Quote

 

 Poster 1: On the first day of Kristmas my kerbal gave to me: A booster.

Poster 2: On the second day of Kristmas my kerbal gave to me: 2 struts and a booster.

Rules: 

1: Try not to repeat.

2: Try to make it rhyme somewhat.

 

3: Try to have it kinda relate to KSP

On the first day of Kristmas my dear kerbal gave to me: All the snack boxes that they made emp-ty!
On the second day of christmas my dear kerbal gave to me: two nerva engines and one snack box that they made empty
On the third day of Khristmas my dear kerbal gave to me:  three models of Kerbin, two NERVA engines and one snack box that they made empty
On the fourth day of Khristmas my dear kerbal gave to me: four static boosters three models of Kerbin, two NERVA engines and one snack box that they made empty

On the fifth day of﻿﻿ Khristmas my dear kerbal gave to﻿ me: Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ three models of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box that they made empty

On the sixth day of Christmas my dear Kerbal gave to me: Six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ three models of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box that they made empty... *sad*

On the seventh day of Khristmas, my dear﻿﻿ ﻿Kerbal gave to me: 7 sentinels-a-scanning, six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ three models of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box t﻿hat the﻿y made empty.

On the eighth day of Khristmas, my dear﻿﻿ ﻿Kerbal gave to me: 8 Lander's landing, 7 sentinels-a-scanning, six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ three models of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box t﻿hat the﻿y made empty... *Sad*

On the ninth day of Khristmas, my preferable Kerbal gave to me three by three snooker balls numbered from 9 downto 1.
As well there were: 8 Lander's landing, 7 sentinels-a-scanning, six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ three models of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box t﻿hat the﻿y made empty, i have no idea from whom.

On﻿ t﻿he tenth day of Khristmas, my hopefully kerbal associate gave to me , 10  Toroidal aerospikes!
As well there wer﻿e: three by three snooker balls numbered from 9 downto 1,  8 Lander's landing, 7 sentinels-a-scanning, six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ ﻿three mode﻿ls of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box t﻿hat the﻿y made empty, i have no idea from whom.﻿

On the eleventh day of Christmas my dear Kerbal gave to me: 11 Terrier engines, 10  Toroidal aerospikes! Three by three snooker balls numbered from 9 down to 1,  8 Lander's landing, 7 sentinels-a-scanning, six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ ﻿three mode﻿ls of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box t﻿hat the﻿y made empty.

On the twelfth day of Christmas my dear Kerbal gave to me: 12 Rovers roving. 11 Terrier engines, 10  Toroidal aerospikes! Three by three snooker balls numbered from 9 down to 1,  8 Lander's landing, 7 sentinels-a-scanning, six pieces of debris, Fiiiive Maaammoth Enginesss! Four static boosters,﻿ ﻿three mode﻿ls of Kerbin﻿, two NERVA engines and one﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿ snack box t﻿hat the﻿y made empty.

Spoiler

Wait...

If this was the twelfth day...

NOW WHAT?

 

Edited May 9, 2019 by The_Arcitect
